analysis.description:
CryptonToken.purchase (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#332-420) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#397-398)
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#409-412)

CryptonToken._payout (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#569-573) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ceoAddress.transfer(myAddress.balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#571-572)
	- _to.transfer(myAddress.balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#572-573)

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#6-22) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#8-9)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#14-15)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#15-17)

CryptonToken (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#22-649) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#189-197)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#518-524)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#498-505)

CryptonToken.defaultMarkup should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#62-63)
CryptonToken.startingPrice should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol#61-62)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0xa068345a625542fe49c299c8df309a920a184200.sol:
